main event: A bright light was seen moving rapidly across the sky in Rancho Palos Verdes, California on November 6, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as metallic and oval shaped, emitting a brilliant white light.
It made a sudden 90 degree turn and then accelerated at an incredible speed, disappearing within seconds.
The witness was a former Air Force pilot who stated this was no conventional aircraft.
The speed, maneuverability and lack of sound led the witness to believe the object was some kind of advanced aerospace vehicle, possibly of extraterrestrial origin.
The entire incident lasted less than a minute but the witness was able to observe the object clearly.
